tags.name: catalogProductRenderListV1
tags.description: Interface which provides product renders information for products

tags.name: catalogSpecialPriceStorageV1
tags.description: Special price storage presents efficient price API and is used to retrieve, update or delete special prices.

post.description: Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product prices. Input item should correspond \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\CostInterface. If any items will have invalid price, store id or sku, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Assign a product to the required category

put.description: Assign a product to the required category

delete.description: Remove the product assignment from the category by category id and sku

schema.description: will returned True if products successfully deleted

get.description: Get info about category by category id

post.description: Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product cost. Input item should correspond to \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\CostInterface. If any items will have invalid cost, store id or sku, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Delete product cost. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown. If error occurred during the delete exception will be thrown.

get.description: Retrieve the list of gallery entries associated with given product
Get the list of custom options for a specific product
Get custom option for a specific product
Provide the list of links for a specific product

post.description: Assign a product link to another product

get.description: Retrieve information about available product link types
Provide a list of the product link type attributes
Collect and retrieve the list of product render info This info contains raw prices and formated prices, product name, stock status, store_id, etc
Get info about product by product SKU

parameters.description: 'all' can be used to specify 'ALL GROUPS'

parameters.description: 'all' can be used to specify 'ALL GROUPS'

post.description: Assign a product to the website

schema.description: will returned True if website successfully assigned to product

put.description: Assign a product to the website

schema.description: will returned True if website successfully assigned to product

delete.description: Remove the website assignment from the product by product sku

schema.description: will returned True if website successfully unassigned from product

post.description: Return product's special price. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product's special price. If any items will have invalid price, store id, sku or dates, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

Delete product's special price. If any items will have invalid price, store id, sku or dates, they will be marked as failed and excluded from delete list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the delete exception will be thrown.
Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product prices. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

put.description: Remove existing tier prices and replace them with the new ones. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from replace list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

post.description: Delete product tier prices. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from delete list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

catalog-data-price-update-result-interfa.description: Interface returned in case of incorrect price passed to efficient price API.

message.description: Error message, that contains description of error occurred during price update.

parameters.description: Parameters, that could be displayed in error message placeholders.

framework-search-filter-group.description: Groups two or more filters together using a logical OR

filters.description: A list of filters in this group

framework-filter.description: Filter which can be used by any methods from service layer.

disabled.description: If gallery entry is hidden from product page

types.description: Gallery entry image types (thumbnail, image, small_image etc)

catalog-data-product-render-search-resul.description: Dto that holds render information about products

catalog-data-product-render-interface.description: Represents Data Object which holds enough information to render product This information is put into part as Add To Cart or Add to Compare Data or Price Data

images.description: Enough information, that needed to render image on front

type.description: Product type. Such as bundle, grouped, simple, etc...

store_id.description: Information about current store id or requested store id

currency_code.description: Current or desired currency code to product

catalog-data-product-render-button-inter.description: Button interface. This interface represents all manner of product buttons: add to cart, add to compare, etc... The buttons describes by this interface should have interaction with backend

url.description: Url, needed to add product to cart

required_options.description: Flag whether a product has options or not

catalog-data-product-render-formatted-pr.description: Formatted Price interface. Aggregate formatted html with price representations. E.g.: $9.00 Consider currency, rounding and html

minimal_price.description: The minimal price of the product or variation

regular_price.description: Price - is price of product without discounts and special price with taxes and fixed product tax

weee-data-product-render-weee-adjustment.description: List of all weee attributes, their amounts, etc.., that product has

tax_amount.description: Tax which is calculated to fixed product tax attribute

catalog-data-product-render-image-interf.description: Product Render image interface. Represents physical characteristics of image, that can be used in product listing or product view

min_qty.description: Minimal quantity available for item status in stock

min_sale_qty.description: Minimum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart or NULL when there is no limitation

max_sale_qty.description: Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart data wrapper

notify_stock_qty.description: Notify for Quantity Below data wrapper

link_url.description: Link url or null when type is 'file'

catalog-data-special-price-interface.description: Product Special Price Interface is used to encapsulate data that can be processed by efficient price API.

store_id.description: ID of store, that contains special price value.

sku.description: SKU of product, that contains special price value.

price_from.description: Start date for special price in Y-m-d H:i:s format.

price_to.description: End date for special price in Y-m-d H:i:s format.
